  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.core.Logable, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, TransactionFilter, RFC8628Constants, RFC8628Constants2
    public class RFC8628Servlet
extends MultiAuthServlet
implements RFC8628Constants2
    Servlet that starts the RFC 8628 device flow .This issues a user code that the user must present to an authorization endpoint.

    Created by Jeff Gaynor
    on 2/9/21 at 11:21 AM

    See Also:
